Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Milestones.Committee: Commerce, Economic Development And Small Business

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

Title: Increases transparency in certain film production and post-production tax credits
Summary: Requires the department of economic development issue a quarterly report on film production and post-production tax credits by project and by county in the aggregate and publish such reports on such department's website.
LawCode: Amd ยง100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to requiring the department of economic development issue a quarterly report on film production and post production tax credits by project and by county in the aggregate and publish such reports on such department's website
